Title: Performance Review
Plot: Michael meets with all of his underlings to discuss their performance in the office so far.  However, Michael focuses more on getting feedback about his relationship with Jan than whether or not the workers are doing their job.  Later, a nervous Michael plans to shuffle through the employee suggestion box to steal exciting ideas for his imminent discussion with Jan about his own performance, but that falls apart when Jan asks to sit in on the discussion.
